result.eng: Could you warm me a cup of milk?
result.ga: An bhféadfá cupán bainne a théamh dom
result.orig: An bhféadfá cupán bainne a théamh dom
result.html: An bhféadfá cupán bainne a théamh domCould you warm me a cup of milk?
result.ponchtml: An ḃféadfá cupán bainne a ṫéaṁ domCould you warm me a cup of milk?

result.eng: Could you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.
result.ga: An bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil Tá an líne ag briseadh
result.orig: An bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil Tá an líne ag briseadh
result.html: An bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil Tá an líne ag briseadhCould you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.
result.ponchtml: An ḃféadfá laḃairt níos airde le do ṫoil Tá an líne ag briseaḋCould you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.

result.ga: An bhféadfá é sin a litriú
result.orig: An bhféadfá é sin a litriú
result.html: An bhféadfá é sin a litriúCould you spell that?
result.ponchtml: An ḃféadfá é sin a litriúCould you spell that?

result.html: An bhféadfá fanacht nóiméadCould you wait a minute?
result.ponchtml: An ḃféadfá fanaċt nóiméadCould you wait a minute?

result.eng: The pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ga: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.orig: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.html: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an pota ċoṁ mór sin go ḃféadfá braċán do ṫeaċ lán boċtán a ḋéanaṁ annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
